tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE supplier_audit (
  audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_id INT,
  audit_date DATE,
  audit_result VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES supplier_data(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SustainabilityData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT,
    sustainability_metric VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    sustainability_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE supplier_sustainability_data (
id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
supplier_id INT,
year INT NOT NULL,
energy_consumption DECIMAL(10,2),
water_usage DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE product_inventory (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    supplier_id INT,
    stock_quantity INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_supplier_id FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id)
        REFERENCES supplier_compliance(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE supplier_contacts (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT,
    contact_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    CONSTRAINT fk_supplier_id FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id)
        REFERENCES supplier_compliance(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE supplier_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    location_address TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_supplier_id FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id)
        REFERENCES supplier_compliance(supplier_id)
);
